trans-unit.source: Represents a statement that removes an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma instrução que remove um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: CodeRemoveEventStatement can be used to represent a statement that removes an event handler for an event.
trans-unit.target: CodeRemoveEventStatement pode ser usado para representar uma instrução que remove um manipulador de eventos para um evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Event%2A> property specifies the event to remove the event handler from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Event%2A>propriedade especifica o evento para remover o manipulador de eventos de.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Event%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Listener%2A> property specifies the event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Listener%2A>propriedade especifica o manipulador de eventos para remover.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Listener%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"></xref> class with the specified event and event handler.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"> </xref> classe com o evento especificado e o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref> that indicates the event to detach the event handler from.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"> </xref> que indica que o evento para desanexar o manipulador de eventos do.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> que indica o manipulador de eventos a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"></xref> class using the specified target object, event name, and event handler.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"> </xref> classe usando o objeto de destino especificado, o nome do evento e o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> que indica o objeto que contém o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> que indica o manipulador de eventos a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event to remove a listener from.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o evento para remover um ouvinte de.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref> that indicates the event to remove a listener from.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"> </xref> que indica para remover um ouvinte de evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o manipulador de eventos a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> que indica o manipulador de eventos a ser removido.
